Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا تُغْوِي
enWisdom: This world misguides

Wisdom: الِاغْتِرَارُ بِالْعَاجِلَةِ خُرْقٌ
enWisdom: Being dazzled by this world [and being proud because of it] is stupidity

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا تَغُرُّ وَتَضُرُّ وَتَمُرُّ
enWisdom: This world deceives, harms and passes by

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا حُلُمٌ وَالِاغْتِرَارُ بِهَا نَدَمٌ
enWisdom: This world is a dream and being deceived by it is [a cause of] regret

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا مَعْدِنُ الشَّرِّ وَمَحَلُّ الْغُرُورِ
enWisdom: This world is the source of evil and the place of deception

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا صَفْقَةُ مَغْبُونٍ وَالْإِنْسَانُ مَغْبُونٌ بِهَا
enWisdom: This world is a deal of the [one who has been] defrauded and human being is defrauded by it

Wisdom: الرُّكُونُ إِلَى الدُّنْيَا مَعَ مَا يُعَايَنُ مِنْ سُوءِ تَقَلُّبِهَا جَهْلٌ
enWisdom: Inclination towards this world despite what is seen of its fickleness is [a sign of] ignorance

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا غُرُورٌ حَائِلٌ وَسَرَابٌ زَائِلٌ وَسِنَادٌ مَائِلٌ
enWisdom: This world is a hindering deception, a vanishing mirage and a bent pillar

Wisdom: اتَّقُوا غُرُورَ الدُّنْيَا فَإِنَّهَا تَسْتَرْجِعُ [تترجع‏] أَبَداً مَا خَدَعَتْ بِهِ مِنَ الْمَحَاسِنِ وَتُزْعِجُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّ إِلَيْهَا وَالْقَاطِنَ
enWisdom: Be wary of the deception of this world, for it always takes back that which it beguiles with from its charms and drives away the one who feels at ease and is settled in it

Wisdom: احْذَرْ أَنْ يَخْدَعَكَ الْغُرُورُ بِالْحَائِلِ الْيَسِيرِ أَوْ يَسْتَزِلَّكَ السُّرُورُ بِالزَّائِلِ الْحَقِيرِ
enWisdom: Be cautious of being deceived by the delusion of a small hindrance or being made to stumble by the joy of an insignificant transitory pleasure [of this world]

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تُخْدَعَ عَنْ دَارِ الْقَرَارِ وَمَحَلِّ الطَّيِّبِينَ الْأَخْيَارِ [الْأَبْرَارِ] وَالْأَوْلِيَاءِ الْأَبْرَارِ [الْأَخْيَارِ] الَّتِي نَطَقَ الْقُرْآنُ بِوَصْفِهَا وَأَثْنَى عَلَى أَهْلِهَا وَدَلَّكَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عَلَيْهَا وَدَعَاكَ إِلَيْهَا
enWisdom: Be careful not to be swindled out of the Permanent Abode, the dwelling of the righteous and the virtuous elite, about whose qualities the Qur’an has spoken and whose dwellers it has praised; while Allah, the Glorified, has guided you and invited you to it

Wisdom: إِنَّ مَنْ غَرَّتْهُ الدُّنْيَا بِمُحَالِ الْآمَالِ وَخَدَعَتْهُ بِزُورِ الْأَمَانِيِّ أَوْرَثَتْهُ كَمَهاً وَأَلْبَسَتْهُ عَمًى [وَ أَكْسَبَتْهُ عَمَهاً] وَقَطَعَتْهُ عَنِ الْأُخْرَى وَأَوْرَدَتْهُ مَوَارِدَ الرَّدَى
enWisdom: Verily the one whom this world has deceived through unfeasible aspirations and cheated with false hopes is made to lose his eyesight and get covered by blindness, and it cuts him off from the Hereafter and makes him enter into places of destruction

Wisdom: إِنَّ الدُّنْيَا غُرُورٌ حَائِلٌ وَظِلٌّ زَائِلٌ وَسِنَادٌ مَائِلٌ تَصِلُ الْعَطِيَّةَ بِالرَّزِيَّةِ وَالْأُمْنِيَّةَ بِالْمَنِيَّةِ
enWisdom: Verily this world is a hindering deception, a disappearing shadow and a bent pillar, it connects bounty with calamity and aspiration with death

Wisdom: إِنَّ الدُّنْيَا غَرَّارَةٌ خَدُوعٌ مُعْطِيَةٌ مَنُوعٌ مُلْبِسَةٌ نَزُوعٌ لَا يَدُومُ رَخَاؤُهَا وَلَا يَنْقَضِي عَنَاؤُهَا وَلَا يَرْكَدُ بَلَاؤُهَا
enWisdom: Verily this world is a deceiving beguiler, it gives and takes back, clothes and then unclothes; its comforts do not last, its hardships do not cease and its calamities do not end

Wisdom: إِنَّ الدُّنْيَا حُلْوَةٌ نَضِرَةٌ حُفَّتْ بِالشَّهَوَاتِ وَرَاقَتْ بِالْقَلِيلِ وَتَحَلَّتْ بِالْآمَالِ وَتَزَيَّنَتْ بِالْغُرُورِ لَا تَدُومُ حَبْرَتُهَا وَلَا تُؤْمَنُ فَجْعَتُهَا غَرَّارَةٌ ضَرَّارَةٌ حَائِلَةٌ زَائِلَةٌ نَافِدَةٌ بَائِدَةٌ أَكَّالَةٌ غَوَّالَةٌ
enWisdom: Indeed this world is sweet and fresh, surrounded by [lustful] desires; it delights with little, and is adorned with hopes and embellished with vanitiesIts exhilaration does not last and its afflictions cannot be avoidedIt is very deceitful, harmful, volatile, evanescent, perishing, transient, devouring and destructive

Wisdom: إِنَّ الدُّنْيَا يُونَقُ مَنْظَرُهَا وَيُوبَقُ مُخْبِرُهَا قَدْ تَزَيَّنَتْ بِالْغُرُورِ وَغَرَّتْ بِزِينَتِهَا دَارٌ هَانَتْ عَلَى رَبِّهَا فَخُلِطَ حَلَالُهَا بِحَرَامِهَا وَخَيْرُهَا بِشَرِّهَا وَحُلْوُهَا بِمُرِّهَا لَمْ يَصْفُهَا اللَّهُ لِأَوْلِيَائِهِ وَلَمْ يَضُنَّ بِهَا عَلَى أَعْدَائِهِ
enWisdom: Verily the outer appearance of this world delights while its reality annihilatesIt has been adorned by vanities and entices by its embellishmentsIt is an abode which is lowly before its Lord, so its lawful has been mixed with its forbidden, its good with its evil and its sweetness with its bitternessAllah has not cleansed it for His friends nor has He withheld it from His enemies

Wisdom: إِنَّمَا الدُّنْيَا شَرَكٌ وَقَعَ فِيهِ مَنْ لَا يَعْرِفُهُ
enWisdom: Indeed, this world is only a trap into which those who do not recognize it fall

Wisdom: حُفَّتِ الدُّنْيَا بِالشَّهَوَاتِ وَتَحَبَّبَتْ بِالْعَاجِلَةِ وَ تَزَيَّنَتْ بِالْغُرُورِ وَتَحَلَّتْ بِالْآمَالِ
enWisdom: This world has been surrounded with lustful desires, liked for its immediate enjoyments, embellished with deceptions and sweetened with aspirations

Wisdom: سُرُورُ الدُّنْيَا غُرُورٌ وَمَتَاعُهَا ثُبُورٌ
enWisdom: The joy of this world is deception and its enjoyment is destruction

Wisdom: سُكُونُ النَّفْسِ إِلَى الدُّنْيَا مِنْ أَعْظَمِ الْغُرُورِ
enWisdom: One’s seeking tranquillity in [the delights of] this world is from the greatest deceptions

Wisdom: غُرُورُ الدُّنْيَا يَصْرَعُ
enWisdom: The deception of this world strikes [a person] down

Wisdom: غُرِّي يَا دُنْيَا مَنْ جَهِلَ حِيَلَكِ وَخَفِيَ عَلَيْهِ حَبَائِلُ كَيْدِكِ
enWisdom: World, deceive the one who is ignorant of your tricks and for whom your traps of deceit are concealed

Wisdom: قَالَ ع فِي وَصْفِ الدُّنْيَا غَرَّارَةٌ ضَرَّارَةٌ حَائِلَةٌ زَائِلَةٌ بَائِدَةٌ نَافِدَةٌ
enWisdom: Indeed this world is sweet and fresh, surrounded by [lustful] desires; it delights with little, and is adorned with hopes and embellished with vanitiesIts exhilaration does not last and its afflictions cannot be avoidedIt is very deceitful, harmful, volatile, evanescent, perishing, transient, devouring and destructive

Wisdom: قَدْ تَزَيَّنَتِ الدُّنْيَا بِغُرُورِهَا وَغَرَّتْ بِزِينَتِهَا
enWisdom: Indeed this world has embellished itself with its deception and it deceives [its inhabitants] with its embellishments

Wisdom: لَمْ يُفَكِّرْ فِي عَوَاقِبِ الْأُمُورِ مَنْ وَثِقَ بِزُورِ الْغُرُورِ وَصَبَا إِلَى زُورِ السُّرُورِ
enWisdom: He who trusts in the falsehood of delusions and yearns for the false [and short-lived] joys has not thought about the consequences of matters

Wisdom: مَنْ رَاقَهُ زِبْرُجُ الدُّنْيَا مَلَكَتْهُ الْخُدَعُ
enWisdom: One who is delighted by the embellishments of this world is owned by [its] deceptions

Wisdom: مَنِ اغْتَرَّ بِالدُّنْيَا اغْتَرَّ بِالْمُنَى
enWisdom: One who is deceived by this world is deceived by [his] aspirations

Wisdom: مَنِ اغْتَرَّ بِمُسَالَمَةِ الزَّمَنِ اغْتَصَّ بِمُصَادَمَةِ الْمِحَنِ
enWisdom: One who is deluded by the peacefulness of the time gets distressed by the impact of calamities

Wisdom: مَنْ عَرَفَ خِدَاعَ الدُّنْيَا لَمْ يَغْتَرَّ مِنْهَا بِمُحَالاتِ الْأَحْلَامِ
enWisdom: One who recognizes the deceptions of this world will not be deceived by its impossible dreams

Wisdom: مَنْ أَمَّلَ الرِّيَّ مِنَ السَّرَابِ خَابَ أَمَلُهُ وَمَاتَ بِعَطَشِهِ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مَنْ سَعَى فِي طَلَبِ السَّرَابِ طَالَ تَعَبُهُ وَكَثُرَ عَطَشُهُ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مَنْ غَرَّهُ السَّرَابُ تَقَطَّعَتْ بِهِ الْأَسْبَابُ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: مَا الدُّنْيَا غَرَّتْكَ وَلَكِنْ بِهَا اغْتَرَرْتَ
enWisdom: This world has not deceived you, rather through it you have been deceived

Wisdom: مَا الْعَاجِلَةُ خَدَعَتْكَ وَلَكِنْ بِهَا انْخَدَعْتَ
enWisdom: The transient world has not beguiled you, rather through it you have been beguiled

Wisdom: قَالَ ع فِي وَصْفِ الدُّنْيَا هِيَ الصَّدُودُ الْعَنُودُ وَالْحَيُودُ الْمَيُودُ وَالْخَدُوعُ الْكَنُودُ
enWisdom: It (this world) is obstructive and obdurate, deviating and swaying, deceiving and ungrateful

Wisdom: لَا تَفْتِنَنَّكُمُ الدُّنْيَا وَلَا يَغْلِبَنَّكُمُ الْهَوَى وَلَا يَطُولَنَّ عَلَيْكُمُ الْأَمَدُ وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُمُ الْأَمَلُ فَإِنَّ الْأَمَلَ لَيْسَ مِنَ الدِّينِ فِي شَيْ‏ءٍ
enWisdom: Do not let this world tempt you, and do not let your vain desires overpower you, and do not consider your stay in this world to be long, and do not let your hopes deceive you, for indeed hopes are not part of religion in any way

Wisdom: لَا تَفْتِنَنَّكَ دُنْيَاكَ بِحُسْنِ الْعَوَارِي [بِحُسْنِ الْعَوَادِي فَعَوَادِي الدُّنْيَا] فَعَوَارِي الدُّنْيَا تَرْتَجِعُ وَيَبْقَى عَلَيْكَ مَا احْتَقَبْتَهُ مِنَ الْمَحَارِمِ
enWisdom: Do not be tempted by good loans [and temporary pleasures], for the loans of this world are returned and you remain with that which you have accumulated of the forbidden

Wisdom: لَا يَسْتَفِزُّ خُدَعُ الدُّنْيَا الْعَالِمَ
enWisdom: The deceptions of this world do not excite the learned

Wisdom: رُبَّ صَادِقٍ [عِنْدَكَ‏] مِنْ خَبَرِ الدُّنْيَا عِنْدَكَ مُكَذَّبٌ
enWisdom: Many a truthful one who informs you about [a matter of] this world may be deemed a liar by you

Wisdom: الدُّنْيَا بِالْأَمَلِ
enWisdom: This world is [filled] with hope
